## ComponentData interface

Contains processed component data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ComponentData 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description](./cli.componentdata.description.md) | <code>string</code> | Description of the component |
|  [lang](./cli.componentdata.lang.md) | <code>PrismLang</code> | Language of the snippet for highlighting |
|  [links](./cli.componentdata.links.md) | <code>Link[]</code> | Custom created link for a component |
|  [snippet](./cli.componentdata.snippet.md) | <code>string</code> | Code snippet of the component |
